title: Jamaat activist killed in Rajshahi
body: An activist of the Bangladesh Jamaat-e-islami was stabbed to death by a group of people in Rajshahi city on Wednesday evening. The deceased is Md Shanto, son of Sattar Ali of the Aliganj area under Rajpara police station. Rajpara Police Station officer-in-charge Abdul Malek said that Shanto was stabbed to death by a group of local people over a land dispute.
